skillTree.localised_description: No hide nor armour can stand against the piercing fury of a Dryad or Tree Kin's savage limbs.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +3 for Dryads units
	(Lord's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +10 for Tree Kin and Grove Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hewn from the same forest that surrounds them, Tree Kin withstand attacks like the forest withstands the fury of the seasons.

effects.description:
Ward save: 10% for Tree Kin and Grove Guardians units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A ranger should give no reprieve to the foe. Arrows must fall like a deluge, as deadly as lightning.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +8%
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Elven hunters emulate Kurnous, the God of the Hunt. Their speed and swiftness is therefore without peer.

effects.description:
Speed: +15% for Elven units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Lord charges their troops to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Howl of the Forest"

skillTree.localised_description: Waystalkers’ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Sight Beyond Sight"

skillTree.localised_description: Once consumed by Loec’s aspect, one can instinctively evade attack through trickery, mimicking his deception of the Dark Gods.

effects.description: Passive ability: "Possessed by the Trickster God"

skillTree.localised_description: Not all spirits of Athel Loren are selfless, some are malevolent and twisted.

attributes.bullet_text: Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

ui_effects.localised_text: Strong vs single and multiple units
Requires line of sight to the target

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

factionEffects.localised_description: Durthu is an Elder of Athel Loren, a Treeman so ancient that even Ariel's millennia-long existence pales in comparison. It was he who first forged a union between Elves and forest, and he also who argued with his fellow Elders that the binding be made permanent.

effects.description: Durthu can unite lands of Athel Loren
Diplomatic relations: -50 with Dwarfs
Passive ability: "Wrath of the Wood" for Ancient Treemen
Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Dwarfs
